newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Hydro Magnesium raises producer pure price.
newsitem.headline: Hydro Magnesium raises producer pure price.

text.p: Hydro Magnesium, a Brussels-based division of Norsk Hydro, said on Friday it had raised its European producer price for pure magnesium to 5.55 DM/kg, from 5.40 DM/kg.
In a statement it added that its producer price for alloy magnesium remained at 5.40 DM/kg.
"The change reflects the combined effect of improved demand for magnesium and downward adjustments of producer output, implemented in 1996," it said in a statement.

It added that global magnesium demand from the aluminium industry had recovered to normal levels and European steel industry usage had also rebounded. In addition, the global die casting market continued to grow strongly.
"Together with the improved demand picture, production cuts by producers in the CIS, China and the USA in 1996 have reduced industry inventories," it said.
